pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tropical Fisheries Analysis // A compilation of fish stock assessment methods for the analysis of length-frequency data in the context of data-poor fisheries. Includes traditional methods and examples included in the FAO Manual by P. Sparre and S.C. Venema (1998), "Introduction to tropical fish stock assessment" (http://www.fao.org/docrep/W5449E/W5449E00.htm), as well as other more recent methods.
